name:
Animal Crossing™: New Leaf
Update Ver. 1.5
formal_name:
Animal Crossing™: New Leaf
Update Ver. 1.5
description:
This is an update for the Animal Crossing™: New Leaf game. This download does not contain the full version of the title. In order to use this update, you must have the full version of Animal Crossing™: New Leaf.

This updated version of Animal Crossing™: New Leaf adds in support for all Animal Crossing series amiibo figures and cards. Tap these amiibo to invite the depicted villager to a new RV campsite, interact with them, and ask them to move into your town!
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
